trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Elkton
There were no other sightings in Elkton on or around June 15th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsSTAR-LIKE LIGHT BUT BRIGHTER, TRAVELING FROM EAST TO WEST THEN STOPPING, AND THEN WHILE GOING FROM WEST TO EAST IT SLOWLY GOT BRIGHTER BY ABOUT 10 TIMES BRIGHTER THEN LOOKING AT A COMMERCIAL JET'S HEADLIGHT FOR ABOUT 3 TO 4 SECONDS, AN THEN THE LIGHT SLOWLY WENT BACK TO IT'S ORIGINAL BRIGHTNESS, THE WHOLE THING LASTED ABOUT 20 SECONDS. I WAS OUT ON MY DECK LOOKING AT THE STARS AND THE MOON, AND I WAS TRYING TO TAKE A PICTURE OF THE MOON, WHEN I NOTICED THE STAR-LIKE LIGHT,(IT WAS A CLEAR NIGHT). MY FIRST IMPRESSION OF IT GOING EAST TO WEST WAS A SATELLITE BUT WHEN IT FADED AND STARTED COMING BACK, WEST TO EAST AND DID THE CRAZY LIGHT DEMONSTRATION,(THAT I HAVE HEARD ABOUT) I KNEW IT WAS THE REAL THING, (A UFO).!!!
Summary: STAR-LIKE LIGHT BUT BRIGHTER, TRAVELING EAST TO WEST THEN STOPPING, AND THEN GOING WEST TO EAST, FOR ABOUT 20 SECONDS
